website_summaries.verdict: Waterproof mascara glides right off with this inexpensive, oil-free cleanser.
pros: Dual-phase formula activates when bottle is shaken
Ophthalmologist tested and approved for contact lens wearers
Popular with those with eye and skin sensitivities
cons: This oil-free formula feels oily and greasy to some users

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, seal was removed. They put a piece of tape over the top.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received did not have a seal on it it had a tape from the pharmacy across the top of the bottle. I have bought this product for years and have always had a product's seal underneath the cap also the product is oil free and 1/2 of the product looked right and the other half was all foggy and separated it is not the way it's supposed to be. I buy this product all the time. I bought 2 bottles from them and they were both that way I don't know if they filled something in there or what they did. Will not use this on my eyes. This should not be sold!!!! Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Best for value and price, nourishing, works on waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.text: A classic and still the BEST for its price range. I’ve tried them all- the CVS wannabe of this, Simple’s, Loreal’s... this is not only the best quality but Best bang for your buck. Gets off waterproof mascara without you needing to freaking scrub your eyelashes off. Great for dry or sensitive skin-ladies like myself. That nourishing feeling after is a plus for those worried about their eye area sensitivity or are missing some eyelid sensitivity. Once in a while I’ll stray away to try something new... but I always come back. It just WORKS. Tips- use with reusable ;makeup remover pads and don’t forget to shake! Good job, Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff. I have been using for over 10 years!
customer_reviews.text: The Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover has been my go-to for years. I like to use this when I apply my mascara. As you can see I get it all over my eye so that I have maximum application. I dip a q-tip into the solution and clean up the mascara mess! You can see the before and after using the makeup remover. It's a mascara-lovers dream!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cannon

customer_reviews.title: i dislike it because it leaves an oily residue around my ...
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, i dislike it because it leaves an oily residue around my eyes. Even inside my eyes i feel some residue from wiping with a cotton pad i end up using saline solution to rinse out my eyes. On a moral level, i learned after buying the product that Neutrogena products are tested on animals. That was it for me. Bye.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Swollen lash line after using to remove mascara
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this product I’ve gotten a stye along my tear ducts four times. The second time I got one, I realized it was due to this product (since it was the only change in my skincare routine) so I decided to be especially careful about rinsing it off/using it around my eyes but unfortunately it keeps happening so I am going to throw it out. In the picture you can see that under my left eye it’s swollen and pink! Also feels very oily. I guess it’s fine for removing foundation but not good for removing waterproof mascara, which is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!!!!! Do not use on eyes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1/3/20: BUYER BEWARE!!!! I just repurchased this item and it is 100% a fake product. The consistency and smell are totally off. It is so oily looking and god knows what it was and what replaced with. There’s no way in hell I'm putting this near my eyes!!!!!! Do not purchase this item of Amazon!!!! I love this stuff! It removes stubborn eye makeup soo easily without pulling or rubbing. Much better than Clinique and I was pleasantly surprised by the size of this bottle. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cherish O.

customer_reviews.title: Oily , cloudy residue in this product!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product often at my local stores but I decided to purchase this product on Amazon and it is awful. Please see the photo attached, this is supposed to be an oil free product and as you can see in the photo there’s this big oily film in this product - this is awful I was planning on using this on my eyes! and I have no idea what is in this, it looks as though it has been tampered with this is disgusting !
customer_reviews.author: Dynette

customer_reviews.title: All I Can Say is WOW
customer_reviews.text: I wear waterproof mascara, which is a real witch to get off. I was using Vaseline to remove my mascara but I hated how much I had to rub and irritate my eyes, so I gave this a try instead. Well, I can't tell you how happy this stuff made me. I put some on a cotton ball, let it sit on my eyes for a few seconds, wiped gently and holy cow, the waterproof mascara came off like butter. The very best part is that it didn't irritate my eyes at all or leave them feeling greasy. It's that gentle. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHeartNY

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Note the instructions - you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Note the instructions - you need to shake it up before you use it (it separates a little). Pros: Doesn't have a chemical smell Cleans most makeup off with a cotton swab or washcloth Cons: Takes a bit of rubbing to get waterproof eyeliner off Leaves a bit of residue or something on my face, but a quick wash with water normally takes that off Overall, I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye makeup remover around. I use to buy Mary Kay but when my rep stopped selling I had to find another alternative. I have very sensitive eyes and needed an oil free remover to help prevent my eyes from becoming oily as other removers have done, which in turn makes my eyeshadow come unbinded, no matter how good the primer was I used, it came off. This has been the perfect replacement for the MK remover and less expensive too! I have bought several bottles of this over the course of 2-3 yrs now and do not see anything changing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzinelly

customer_reviews.title: Not oily, just moisturizing! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Just shake before use and a small amount can take off a lot! There are some reviews claiming that it is oily because they separate, but I am here to tell you it IS oil free. I don’t know what cause the separation but it is not oil. You can just rub the excess into your skin after removing the makeup to help with moisturizing. If you think it’s oily, try using baby oil. Then you’ll appreciate how amazing it is. Baby oil never comes off, but within a few minutes of using this stuff your face is soft but dry. No oil! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nived Notro

customer_reviews.title: Quickest way to clean
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has been my go-to remover for years and years. It's a bit oily, but I really don't care. I'd rather need a cloth to wipe off remaining oil than fight with smearing make-up for many minutes. This stuff will cut any make-up in seconds. Also great for touch-ups. Because of how easily and completely it takes off makeup without smudging, it's my favorite for touching up details of, say, eyeliner or dark lippies.
customer_reviews.author: Eemn83

customer_reviews.title: ... item because of the positive reviews But this is disgusting it’s very oily feels like I lathered myself in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because of the positive reviews But this is disgusting it’s very oily feels like I lathered myself in baby oil you need to clean up a product thats made to clean up your makeup I have to go buy wipes instead because this product is too oily and leaves your vision very blurry
customer_reviews.author: Ineedtogetoffamazon

customer_reviews.title: Feels like WD 40 !!  Left a silky shiny residue on my face!  EWWWW!!
customer_reviews.text: How can this be oil free? I dipped a cotton swab into the bottle to test and see it if would be greasy. To my disgust and disappointment it felt like WD-40!!! I used the swab to wipe under my eyes and it was so slick and just "slippery" I had to wash my face with a washcloth to get the residue off my face. My mascara would most certainly have melted down into this slick mess under my eyes. I wanted to immediately return it but --- DISAPPOINTMENT #2 - no refunds. So LIVE and LEARN! I'll stick to ALMAY. I'm so disgusted!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PR in PCNY

customer_reviews.title: No Seal Underneath Cap
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure whether to fault Neutrogena or Amazon but my product did not come with any seal underneath the cap. To not have a seal on a product you're using on your eyelids/eyes is insane.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that doesn't burn!
customer_reviews.text: I have had such a hard time finding an eye makeup remover that does not burn my eyes. I had lasik surgery 3 years ago and since then my eyes are ridiculously sensitive. This remover is amazing! It doesnt burn if you get a tad in your eyes.. it moisturizers and takes off any makeup. I have used for both waterproof and regular both come off with just a few swipes. I also use to take off my lipstick since I use an all day lip stain. Take it off with 2 swipes. I had my mom try this and she is now just in love with it as I am!
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Wow - Mascara Remover!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble removing waterproof mascara. All the tugging and raccoon eyes with castor oil and other products was not good. Came across a review for this Neutrogena remover. It’s fantastic. I pat it over my lashes with a cotton ball and let it sit a second or two. It easily removes the mascara from lashes and the under eye area with no black smudges left. There is no drying of sensitive under eye skin. It has a faint scent that I don’t really notice. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: "Raven"

customer_reviews.title: No seal!!
customer_reviews.text: Seal was removed and product looked cloudy. I used once (should not have). Burned eyes and they were red and clouded over even after using eye drops. In the past I have purchased in store with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SENSITIVE EYES
customer_reviews.text: This is my fave eye makeup remover. I saturate organic cotton pads, hold to my closed eye for a few seconds, and gently wipe away all eye makeup. I have sensitive eyes, but this has never been irritating. I have tried prestige brands, but keep coming back to Neutrogena. Note: I do not wear waterproof eye makeup, so I can not comment for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DestinTart

customer_reviews.title: Best eye makeup remover.  Used for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. It is strong enough to remove the toughest mascara and lash adhesive, yet soothing, and does not sting, or burn. The light oil does separate, but you shake it to mix with the water, as this is the way the product works best. I love this product. I hardly ever write reviews, can’t remember the last time I did. I’m always skeptical when I read them, and think they could be from someone trying to support their own product. I’m for real. Buy it, you won’t regret it. Do remember to shake the fluid before applying it to a cotton round for use. Really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fully take off mascara
customer_reviews.text: I buy this because it’s gentle on my face. It does remove water proof mascara. However, it doesn’t take it off all the way. I’m always finding mascara still on my lashes the next day. The price is good, same as Walmart. I may try another product to see if I can find one I don’t have to repeatedly use
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The Neutrogena Cleansing Oil-free eye makeup remover is very effective at getting off all my eye makeup. I pour it on cotton rounds and gently rub across each eye. It is quite oily, but as the directions state, I take a damp warm towel to rinse it off. I would not recommend using this on any other part of your face other than the eye area, as it is so oily it would likely cause break outs. It is gentle for my eyes and I've never experienced any irritation from it. One 5.5 ounce bottle lasts me a little less than 2 months. This seems rather quick to me. I may try another brand when this bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product so much
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of my Sephora brand makeup remover and needed a quick stand in. So, I decided to give this a try. I loved this product so much, I refuse to go back to the Sephora brand. My skin feels much less oily after using this product compared to the Sephora brand. Additionally, it seems to go much farther. I don't feel I use near as much of this product as I did the Sephora product. This just goes to show that expensive name brands aren't all they're cracked up to be. I'll continue buying this product moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy of Oz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however, it came in the mail and the entire bottle had emptied into the bubble envelope and it is a non-returnable item. Just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Bertera

customer_reviews.title: Not oil-free as it claimed
customer_reviews.text: It did remove my waterproof mascara, but it's not oil-free as it claimed, and quite opposite it's very oily, and easy to get into your eyes and make your eyes uncomfortable and foggy view. That's been said, don't but this if you wear contact, it destroyed one pair of my contacts, and try not to use it on your eyes. Another thing you need to know is that this item is not eligible to return, So if you buy it, you rather stick with it or throw it in trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Simpson

customer_reviews.title: It works with NO burning in my eyes at all
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal for make-up remover. It does not sting or burn my eyes at all. One sweep and my eyeliner is off, and the eye area is moisterized. It gets off my lip stain, with just a cotton ball. Make-up remover towelettes, go too fast and cost much more. Sticking with this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for waterproof eye products!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a regular mascara and got waterproof instead. I usually have a harder time with waterproof mascara so I got this to help take it off. Works wonders on my lashes and while eye overall. Mainly use yhe for lashes and eyelids and use facial wipes after for the rest of my face.
customer_reviews.author: D'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do without oil
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this works but it does remove eye makeup. I've always been sloppy about that but I have to use some gunky eye drops now and if I don't take off my eye makeup, things get messy. So I'm finally taking the eye makeup off at night and this works great. Price is definitely right also. But I've always liked Neutrogena products.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: She's been using this for years
customer_reviews.text: For as long as I can remember, my wife has been using this, and only this, to remove her makeup. Finding it can sometimes be a challenge, but Amazon had it and the price was right. She has fairly sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate, and it removes the makeup quickly so you're not scrubbing and scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: oil-free but still feels oily
customer_reviews.text: does the job of removing makeup, however, even though it says oil-free, it’ll leave an oily feeling residue on your face. i used this product to remove excess makeup after already washing my face. it made me break out overnight. i suggest you wash your face again after using this so that it won’t clog your pores.
customer_reviews.author: tribey

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many makeup removers in my life, but this is by far the very best. A little bit goes a long way. The only other makeup remover that is comparable is Mary Kay’s but it’s a lot more money. I only use waterproof mascara and eyeliner and this takes both of them off like a dream. I highly, highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Roswell

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best! Gentle on the Eyes and it works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years!! It is a makeup staple because it is so gentle on the eyes and it is at a great price point. I have tried so many other products that were even more expensive, but this product has been the gentlest for my skin, while still removing eye make up well without drying the skin!
customer_reviews.author: Angelic

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for removing eye makeup. I use the flat cotton swabs and put this into one of the bottles you just push the cotton swab on (see picture, I just found the bottle at my local Dollar Tree). This also doesn't burn your eyes of you get a little in them, which I was afraid of. If you have a ton if mascara caked on, it doesn't completely remove it in one use, though, but definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this make-up remover!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product and have bought it before several times but this bottle shows a separation in liquid that I've never seen.... I went to the local Ulta store and found out that the product CAN look like this because as the directions say, you have to SHAKE it BEFORE using, so if it looks separated it's okay to use, just shake it!
customer_reviews.author: Blondsungoddessh

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive product. Right now I’m using Voluminous False Fiber Lashes Waterproof and using just one cotton ball per eye it was able to remove the product with ease. I wear contacts and left them in during eye makeup removal and no complaints. It didn’t burn, it smells pleasant and as far as the product that is left behind after mascara removal, I used it as moisturizer around my eyes. Pros - Works great, smells good, reasonable price Cons - I don’t have any for this product I will continue to use this product and I would recommend it to anyone looking for an eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only make-up remover I will ever use
customer_reviews.text: This make-up remover is the best one on the market. The price is incredibly reasonable, and I think it works better than the super expensive stuff you can buy at Sephora. This product has never irritated my skin, and I've never had to use it twice because it gets the job done in the first round.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. It just takes a few cotton rounds to take off all my makeup. Takes off everything super easily, including waterproof stuff and lip stains. It doesnt sting or irritate my eyes at all, and I'm very sensitive. It does feel a little oily, but I wipe it off with some water/a damp cotton oval. A little goes a long way, making it a much better value than wipes. A must-have for every makeup user.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: It's okay to use
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin so i can't use if there are a lot of chemical stuffs but this one doesn't have a lot of chemical scents so i could used this. however, this product not really erase my eyes make up completely that is why i give 3 stars..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as high end!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been trying to find an affordable eye makeup remover and THIS is it. It works just as well as Clinique IMO. I put some on the Neutrogena makeup remover towelettes so imthey have double the power and that takes off my whole face of water proof makeup. Then I use the Neutrogena toner before I do other skin care. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: This remover gets the job done, and it's cheap, so there's not a whole lot of complaining I can do. If I wanted a makeup remover that doesn't irritate my eyeballs a little when it leaks in there, or a remover that doesn't need to be washed off, I would've gone for Dr. Jart Dermaclear Micro Water. But that's $35. This was less than $5. A little bit of this remover goes a long way. I pour the tiniest bit onto a cotton ball, and gently wipe. I then rinse my eyes with some water to get the oily layer that remains off. Good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne R

customer_reviews.title: This oil-free eye makeup remover is hands down my favorite. I used this prior to having lasik & ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil-free eye makeup remover is hands down my favorite. I used this prior to having lasik & it never bothered my contacts & I've found my eyes are more sensitive after lasik & it doesn't irritate them. Also, I like that you don't have to use a lot of this product to remove your eye makeup. A small amount does the trick even when I'm wearing "date-night" eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Liquid Eye Makeup Remove
customer_reviews.text: I like Neutrogena, this makeup remover is fine for my needs. I don't wear mascara that often, so I haven't tried using it to remove mascara. I trust the brand name Neutrogena. I buy other products too. Good price. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: dolphins0916

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!!! Fake!! Not Neutrogena make-up remover!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product! I even went and compared to one in CVS and it is noticeably different. There's a clear line where one liquid stops and another behind and it is separated in the bottle. Doesn't smell the same either. Seal was broken and open Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt / Ash

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this stuff. I don’t know if it’s just the bottle I got or they changed their formula, but this made me break out in hives everywhere it touched after a few days of use. The first couple days I got a hive each day, but that happens at times, but then it was my whole eye area and it lasted all day! I still have a few bumps left the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Candymlm

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed product and rash around eyes
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this from target/grocery stores for years, it's always worked well for me. Due to the pandemic, I needed to order online-- the product arrived with no safety or hygiene seal, which I thought was weird but figured I'd use it anyway. Since using, I've developed a red, bumpy rash around my eyes anywhere that the product touched which has never happened with this product before when purchased from the store! Very skeptical that this is a safe or legitimate product from Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This Eye Makeup Remover is one of the best! I have oily skin,wear eye make up every single day and had tried many different brands. This one remove my make up but not my lashes! It also does not burn my eyes at all, the problem I had with an expensive brand. over all very happy and going to stay on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with removing makeup. I usually have lash extensions on and this product has never created any fallout. I’ve used another brand that burned my eyes, this one is gentle. Just wish it was animal cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Mandii Vega

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I had been a Mary Kay eye makeup remover user forever. Tried a lot of other products/removers and none compared to Mary Kay until this! Even better in my opinion than Mary Kay eye make up remover and cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: sharon barry

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the beat makeup remover I amd my daughter have ever used. No smell. Takes waterproof makeup right off with little scrubbing. It's great for after you put on makeup to clean the eye area up. It leaves the eye area soft and moisturized. No harshness of the eyes. Safe in sensitive skin. We won't use anything else
customer_reviews.author: tymin

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best eye make-up remover.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite eye makeup remover. I have used it for 5+ years. I've tried others but always come back to this one. It removes make-up easily without scrubbing whether it be waterproof or regular. Just dab a little on a q-tip or cotton ball and gently remove. I have super sensitive skin and this has never caused any issues. Will always use this as my primary go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: So oily!
customer_reviews.text: Oil free make remover? The most oily make up remover I’ve ever used. My skin is coated with oil after I remove my make up with it. Immediately have to wash my face with soap. Takes the make up though... 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Oily mess, burns a bit on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This says oil free but the consistency is so unbelievably oily and it even burns a bit on my sensitive eye area. It doesn’t work very well on mascara and liner, it takes some significant tugging on the skin to remove the makeup which is obviously not good to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Not happy arrived empty
customer_reviews.text: I'm this product wdeluvered open and empty as it was packed incorrectly heavy cases if beverages etc. The box was soaked and it contents covered in oil. Im very disappointed. There was food in package as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie k

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! It works great for eyeliner and eyeshadow that is waterproof. Had a long night out on Halloween so makeup was applied the whole night, got home and used this without any complications removing my makeup! Doesnt irritate your eyes either so thats a great plus for it
customer_reviews.author: Nebri

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Cleans up make up real good!
customer_reviews.text: My go to product to remove makeup! I usually take a cotton ball and soak a bit into the solution. Then it's just a simple wipe across my eyelids and it also works well on your face as well. I also combine this with some tea tree oil face pads. If you also use fake eyelashes, this also makes them so easy to take off too!
customer_reviews.author: Corrin Fates

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on stubborn eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been buying it for years. It is one of the only products that will remove my stubborn eyeliner. So many other makeup removers don’t even touch it. I hope they never stop making this stuff. You do need to shake it up each time you use it and the ingredients do separate.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have tried everything out there from natural stuff from professionals ones you name it, but nothing compares to this product. I wear contacts and I’m my eyes are very sensitive, however this product does an excellent job at removing mascara and eyeshadow. I believe I found exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Glez

customer_reviews.title: The best make up remover product out there!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite make up remover for several years. I won’t use anything else. It is gentle on my eyes and removes everything thoroughly. And, the bottle lasts FOREVER!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A. Eager

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - cover is not sealed! Tossed
customer_reviews.text: Whether this product works or irritates eyes or skin, I don't know. The cap was not sealed so there was no way to know if the product was sterile. I tossed the product rather than return it. I learned that in the future I will ask whether these products have been sealed before ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Oily but works wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is pretty oily it works wonders. I do some pretty crazy eye makeup and it gets all of it off extremely easily. I personally put some on a makeup wipe and use that to get the makeup off, even though it works well alone. I have very sensitive skin and it has never made my skin irritated or having a burning sensation. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: trinitywebb

customer_reviews.title: Will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.text: I was really quite surprised at how dissatisfied I was with this product. It truly dried out my skin so badly in 40 years I've never experienced.. And here I thought with the name brand I was getting a better quality. Not sure what they use in it but I will not be purchasing this again and will be telling my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jette

customer_reviews.title: Tempered with
customer_reviews.text: Had it replaced. Came opened both times! Clearly tempered with. No seal whatsoever. And it clearly has an oily layer that separates. This is going in the garbage. I don't feel comfortable putting something that was opened on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sibora

customer_reviews.title: Non oily?
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with no protective seal and the top half was separated like oil, so I assume it is oil. I asked for a refund. It just doesn’t seem authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Van Doren

customer_reviews.title: Says oil free but I can't wipe makeup off with this and apply more because there's an oily film
customer_reviews.text: I took a star because if I make a mistake when applying my make up and wipe it off with this remover - I can't put my liquid eyeliner on. Otherwise it pulls the make up straight off and doesn't bother my eyes like makeup wipes can.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D

customer_reviews.title: Removes even the most stubborn waterproof mascara and lash glue!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I purchased this to remove my lash glue as it was recommended as a dupe for Lashify's Melt Away which costs $21. I put some on a cotton round and hold it against my eyelid for 20-30 seconds and wipe and the glue comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Carmencita

customer_reviews.title: Item was tampered with. Had soap water instead of makeup remover. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This item was clearly tampered with. First, there was no seal and it had already been opened. I've used this makeup remover for years and I know what it looks like. It is not supposed to be cloudy and soapy. Seems like the seller poured most of the makeup remover out and replaced it with soap-water. Don't but from them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam N. Nunn

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is very oily It does not rinse off clean Some of the cleaner went into my eye and left them blurry for awhile No matter how much I tried to rinse it off There was a oily residue
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & relible
customer_reviews.text: Light, gentle, effective and affordable for removing waterproof makeup. It's a biphase makeup remover. I don't have to work hard to remove my makeup so it's great for gentler areas like the eyes. This is also my mom’s favorite eye makeup remover. It leaves less oily residue compared to other eye makeup removers. The only downside is the lack of stopper on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JenEvan

customer_reviews.title: Works on waterproof makeup.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s a little on the expensive side for the size of it, but it most certainly removes ALL kinds of makeup from your face, including waterproof mascara and lip stains. Some of the other products make you rub yourself silly. You don’t have to do that with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed!! It doesn’t remove 100% of my waterproof mascara, but still..it’s so much easier to clean! I actually stopped using mascara for a while because I was just lazy to spend so much time trying to clean it. But this product solved my problem!
customer_reviews.author: R Hall

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best eye make-up remover I've ever used. It removes eye make-up flawlessly with just one swipe unlike other ones I've tried. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Bianka Rene

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried better but for the price it does the job
customer_reviews.text: It works better then some of the cheaper products I’ve used but not as good as some do the high end products I’ve used. It does not irritate my skin and I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi

customer_reviews.title: So oily that after used the bottle is too oily to handle
customer_reviews.text: Too oily and the product has so much more oil in it than what I usually buy. Maybelline eye makeup remover is just as advertised, not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi McDavid

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many makeup remover and always come back to this one. This make removing waterproof mascara so much easier, no tugging, it just comes right off!
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Removes non permanent eye make up.
customer_reviews.text: This product does a good job of removing non permanent eye makeup! I wet a cotton round & use the Neutrogena eye removal on the pad. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with the product
customer_reviews.text: Oil free eye makeup remover I bought is different than the regular one I purchased before. The upper layer should be clear but the one I got is not. I dare not to use it on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Bottle top
customer_reviews.text: It is an oil and instead of having an opening that you squeeze the product out- when you pour it out you get 3 times more than you need. I say don’t buy until they change the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: MaryE

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, seal broken.  don’t buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Damaged, seal broken. Can’t return. Do not buy this!!! It costs the same as Walmart.com, but if it comes damaged there’s nothing you can do.
customer_reviews.author: csk

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Very irritating for sensitive eyes Doesn't clean eye makeup easily
customer_reviews.author: JOCELYNE NASSIF

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't irritate my eyes at all and I'm extremely sensitive. Takes off everything with a couple cotton rounds, including lip stains. Has a slightly oily feel but i just wipe it off with a damp cotton oval and it's fine. A much better value than wipes. Highly recommend to any makeup user.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as what is sold in stores
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product is nothing like the one I buy in stores. My first clue was the separated layers in the bottle when I took it out of the box. The consistency is slightly oily when the product shouldn't be oily at all. It doesn't work as quickly as it should. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Not for Super Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love this for everything but my super duper water proof mascara. Eventually it comes off, but not all the way. Otherwise, this is great for sensitive eyes as a daily makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S-H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, removes make up easily without hard scrubbing. It is also a lot cheaper then some other make up removing products from Mary Kay or Younique, but in my opinion works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, but I don’t think I’ll purchase it again
customer_reviews.text: It is good for sensitive skin. My skin is very sensitive I get redness and irritation easily. However I don’t like the oily touch after use. The brand is good, but I rather using something natural and organic.
customer_reviews.author: Limlim128

customer_reviews.title: The best eye make up remover for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my quintessential eye make up remover. It works great, and is reasonable in cost. I have bought more expensive ones that were good, and I have surely bought cheaper ones that were poor quality. I am settled on Neutrogena Eye Make Up Remover.
customer_reviews.author: roserose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive eyes and this works great! I use it at night to give my eyes a break from the ten coats of mascara I normally have on. It doesn't leave a nasty residue and has a lovely smell to it. A+
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: No Pulling or rubbing
customer_reviews.text: The very best eye makeup remover ever. Non greasy... removes waterproof mascara and eyeliner without pulling and tugging. It's also great for removing long lasting lipstick or lipstain with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Beth l

customer_reviews.title: Even after multiple attempts - will not remove waterproof mascara entirely
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective at removing mabelline waterproof mascara. Requires multiple attempts and sometimes results in losing lashes. You have to rub with cottonball pretty aggressively, which still doesn't remove all of the mascara. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kitkat18

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal is missing
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and was surprised there is no safety seal underneath the cap. Do not feel comfortable using this product. Going to return it to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you have eyelash extensions
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use this product if I do not have any almond or jojoba oil on hand to remove my makeup. I especially bought this product when I had in eyelash extensions and needed an oil free makeup remover. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jarisa

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t remove mascara, and is pretty oily. No safety seal on bottles, so it can be somebody poured some other product in as it’s hard to believe Neutrogena would produce something this bad and so many people gave great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Oily With A Greasy Residue
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer claims it's oil-free and won't leave a greasy residue, not true. Very disappointing. When I went online to request a return it says item is not returnable. I guess that's what I get for trying something different. Loreal is what I've used for years and it's what I will stick with.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great at removing even heavy eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product. I wear full eye make up every day and this takes it off really well. The only harder part is when I wear an eyelash primer under the mascara, the primer wants to stick a little to the lashes. However, I love this product enough I'd buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pan

customer_reviews.title: No bag and half open package.
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today. I hate the fact that the package was half open and the bottle was without a box or any protection. I lost my purchase because I’m not going to put that on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Best for value and Price
customer_reviews.text: It’s almost 4 years that I used this eye makeup removers and it’s one of my favorites. Neutrogena is a classic brand. It’s great for sensitive skin and not too oily to be annoying. Shaking the bottle before using would help to mix the product and improve the product effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Roya

customer_reviews.title: Not oil-free, arrived open.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely oily, not oil-free. And the bottle was opened before it arrived. Got a refund from Amazon since this product is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't burn my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a variety of makeup removers since the wipes burn my eyes. I was having a hard time finding a remover that didn't cost a lot of money, but was also able to remove my waterproof mascara and eyeliner without having to drench my cotton pad. Really happy with this product since it doesn't burn or leave me red after using. Would caution that it leaves an oily feel despite stating that it is an oil free product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn`t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My impression is that this makeup remover is so mild that it really doesn't work very well. The Neutrogena wipes are far better. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: vincent dollive

customer_reviews.title: the only make up remover I use
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. I use this when I only put eye make up on (otherwise I'll use the Neutrogena face wipes for simplicity). This gets my makeup off super easily and my skin doesn't feel dried out/rough after.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Remover - even on waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Neutrogena wipes. I switched to a Makeup Eraser (a microfiber face wash cloth) to make less waste. This makeup remover can be put on a corner of my cloth and it removes my tough eyeliner and waterproof mascara but washes right out of the Makeup Eraser when I toss it in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Liquid Eye Makeup Remover, Residue-Free, Non-Greasy, Gentle & Skin-Soothing Makeup Remover Solution with Aloe & Cucumber Extract for Waterproof Mascara, 5.5 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Style Name:Liquid Remover 5.5ozUse the Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover Solution to help gently remove makeup from around your eyes. This dual-phase lightweight liquid removes even waterproof eye makeup, including mascara and eyeliner, without any tugging or pulling. Because the formula is oil-free, it does not leave behind any oily residue. Aloe and cucumber extracts in the makeup remover soothe skin and leave it feeling cool and refreshed. This non-greasy & oil-free makeup removing formula is ophthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers as part of their at-home skincare routine
feature_bullets: 5.5-fluid ounces of Neutrogena Oil-Free Liquid Eye Makeup Remover Solution to gently remove eye makeup without pulling or tugging
Dual-phase oil-free liquid makeup remover effectively helps take off even stubborn waterproof eye makeup like mascara, eyeliner or eye shadow
The lightweight, oil-free formula is non-greasy and contains soothing aloe and cucumber extracts for a refreshing feel with no oily residue
The effective & gentle makeup removing solution is ophthalmologist-tested and developed by dermatologists to be safe for contact lens wearers and gentle for sensitive face and eye area

To use the eye makeup remover, shake well and apply with a cotton pad on closed eyelids, then gently rinse with warm water. These cleansing wipes are the perfect addition to your at-home skincare routine

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
